attributes.action: call an early election with non of the above
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It appears that this country has lost the support and understanding of the current government and those standing in the wings.

It is time that this country had a leadership that recognises what we want and how we want to be led.

Non of the above appear to be able to be able to fulfil this role.

VOTE NON OF THE ABOVE and lets get our country back and a goverment fit for purpose

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
